Info.Title: Tai Chi 2: The Hero Rises
Info.Writer: Chia-Lu Chang (screenplay), Kuo-Fu Chen (story), Hsiao-tse Cheng (screenplay)

Info.Plot: About the early years of Yang Luchan, a Tai chi master. The man who founded Tai Chi in the 19th century and what has now become the most popular Tai Chi style in the world. The second ...
